event1.title: Pastor Appreciation Month
event1.description: October is Pastor appreciation month. Send cards of encouragement and appreciation.

event3.title: Chili Supper
event3.description: Global Hunger Chili Supper hosted by Acteens/GA's

ministry1.title: Bus Ministry
ministry1.description: Our Bus ministry team picks up and brings home any children, youth, or adults that wish to come to church to attend services, and children and youth activities. Available every Sunday and Wednesday Night.

ministry2.title: Bread of Life
ministry2.description: One Sunday a month our ministry prepares meals for needy families, the elderly, or shut-ins. Meals can be eaten at the church in the Family Life Center or can be delivered. Food boxes available by calling the church.

ministry3.title: Anna's Closet
ministry3.description: Anna's Closet is a clothing closet for all ages! Free, gently used clothes, shoes, blankets, and jackets for those that are in need of items. Always appreciated are Hygiene Items, NEW Athletic Shoes, NEW or gently used Jeans, NEW underwear and NEW socks (all sizes). Seasonal clothing in good, clean condition and preferably on hangers.
